text: Khadim Hussain Rizvi (; 22 May 1966 â€“ 19 November 2020) was a Pakistani far right radical preacher. He was the founder of Tehreek-e-Labbaik Pakistan. He was known for his protest against any change to Pakistan's blasphemy law. He was born in Pindigheb, West Pakistan. On 19 November 2020, Rizvi was taken to the Shaikh Zayed Hospital in Lahore and died a few hours later, aged 54. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Pakistani writers Category:Politicians from Punjab, Pakistan Category:Islamic religious leaders
title: Khadim Hussain Rizvi
